ing: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste
n: Insalata di Finocchi e Avocado (Fennel and Avocado Salad)
des: "In this salad, soft avocado goes perfectly with crispy fennel, the sweetness of one complementing the freshness of the other.Â Adding a dash of nutmeg makes this fragrant blend of flavors even more interesting. An impromptu salad, but one of my favorites."
ins: Mix fennel and avocado together in a bowl. Stir in oil, nutmeg, and salt; mix until well combined.
